content: Singaporean senior civil servant **Peter Ho Hak Ean** [DUNU](/wiki/Darjah_Utama_Nila_Utama) [DUBC](/wiki/Darjah_Utama_Bakti_Cemerlang) [PJG](/wiki/Pingat_Jasa_Gemilang) [PPA(E) PPA(P)](/wiki/Pingat_Pentadbiran_Awam_(Tentera)) [PBS](/wiki/Pingat_Bakti_Setia) is a retired Singaporean senior civil servant. Ho was the chairman of the [Urban Redevelopment Authority](/wiki/Urban_Redevelopment_Authority), Social Science Research Council, Singapore Centre for Environmental Life Sciences Engineering and National Supercomputing Centre. Ho is also a member of the council of the [International Institute for Strategic Studies](/wiki/International_Institute_for_Strategic_Studies) and a senior advisor to the Centre for Strategic Futures. ## Awards and decorations - [Order of Nila Utama](/wiki/Darjah_Utama_Nila_Utama) (With High Distinction), in 2024. - [Distinguished Service Order](/wiki/Darjah_Utama_Bakti_Cemerlang), in 2016. - [Meritorious Service Medal](/wiki/Pingat_Jasa_Gemilang), in 2007. - [Public Administration Medal (Military) (Gold)](/wiki/Pingat_Pentadbiran_Awam_(Tentera)), in 1997. - [Public Administration Medal (Military) (Silver)](/wiki/Pingat_Pentadbiran_Awam_(Tentera)), in 1983. - [Long Service Medal](/wiki/Pingat_Bakti_Setia), in 1998. ## Works - "A Mexican Fandango with a Poisonous Shrimp" in Beating the Odds Together: 50 Years of Singapore-Israel Ties. Ed. Mattia Tomba. Singapore: [World Scientific Book](/wiki/World_Scientific), 2019 .
